idea-plugin.name: Thisifier
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin helps Java developers quickly add the 'this.' prefix to method calls, improving code consistency and readability. Simply right-click and select "Add 'this' prefix to method call" from the context menu to quickly apply it.

这个插件帮助Java开发者快速为方法调用添加'this.'前缀，提高代码的一致性和可读性。点击鼠标右键的菜单项 Add 'this' prefix to method call 即可快速添加!
